PHRASE.LANG: It's always best to accessorize with neon bracelets in case the lights go out. [#Legal]
C'est toujours pratique d'avoir des bracelets fluorescents en cas de coupure de courant. [#Legal]
Es ist immer gut ein Neon-Armband zu tragen, falls das Licht mal ausgeht. [#Legal]
In caso di black out, dei braccialetti al neon fanno sempre comodo. [#Legal]
Nunca está de más ponerse pulseras de neón, por si se va la luz. [#Legal]
정전을 대비한 네온 팔찌입니다. 숙녀는 준비성이 철저해야 하니까요. [#Legal]
It's always best to accessorize with neon bracelets in case the lights go out. [#Legal]
以防燈光熄滅，最好還是佩帶螢光手鐲。 [#Legal]
